Package puakma.system

Interface Summary
ActionRunnerInterface  
pmaThreadInterface This enforces objects to conform when used with the pmaThreadPool stuff
 

Class Summary
ActionRunner This is the skeleton class used to run a user programmer defined action.
Cookie Simple wrapper class for dealing with http cookies.
Document  
DocumentFileItem Describes a file item attached to a document
DocumentItem Title: DocumentItem
DocumentMultiItem This is a multivalue item, used for things like the SendTo field in an email With this you can also map a 1 to many relationship in a single document, well, kludge it anyway!
DocumentObjectItem  
Parameter This class is used to store parameter values retrieved from the rdbms.
pmaSession  
pmaSessionCleaner  
pmaSystem This is the System class which should act like the glue to hold all the pieces together.
pmaThread For use with the thread pool manager.
pmaThreadPoolManager The ThreadPoolManager manages a bunch of pmaThreads.
RequestPath The RequestPath object is used to make and parse URIs to Tornado applications.
SessionContext The SessionContext is used to protect an individual user session from malicious damage (as does the SystemContext).
SystemContext The SystemContext is used to protect the system class from programmers who may 'accidentally' set it to null or destroy some system properties.
UserRoles Title:
X500Name This class creates X500 style names, ie CN=Brendon Upson/OU=Dev/O=webWise Supports many OUs X500Name cn = new X500Name("John Smith"); X500Name full = new X500Name("John Smith/Marketing/Sydney/ACME"); X500Name canon = new X500Name("CN=John Smith/OU=Marketing/OU=Sydney/O=ACME"); X500Name country = new X500Name("CN=John Smith/OU=Marketing/OU=Sydney/O=ACME/C=AU"); String sz = full.getAbbreviatedName(); sz = full.getCanonicalName(); boolean b = full.equals(canon); b = full.equals(canon, true); //case sensitive name compare String X.500 AttributeType ------------------------------ CN commonName L localityName ST stateOrProvinceName O organizationName OU organizationalUnitName C countryName STREET streetAddress DC domainComponent UID userid
